profiles {
    virus {
        strict-antivirus {
            decoder {
                ftp {
                    action reset-both;
                    wildfire-action reset-both;
                }
                http {
                    action reset-both;
                    wildfire-action reset-both;
                }
                smb {
                    action reset-both;
                    wildfire-action reset-both;
                }
                smtp {
                    action reset-both;
                    wildfire-action reset-both;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    spyware {
        strict-antispyware {
            botnet-domains {
                lists {
                    default-paloalto-dns;
                }
                sinkhole {
                    ipv4-address 72.5.65.111;
                    ipv6-address 2600:5200::1;
                }
            }
            rules {
                block-critical-high {
                    severity critical;
                    severity high;
                    action reset-both;
                    packet-capture single-packet;
                }
                alert-medium-low {
                    severity medium;
                    severity low;
                    severity informational;
                    action alert;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    vulnerability {
        strict-vulnerability {
            rules {
                block-critical-high {
                    vendor-id any;
                    severity critical;
                    severity high;
                    action reset-both;
                    threat-name any;
                    host any;
                    packet-capture single-packet;
                }
                block-medium {
                    vendor-id any;
                    severity medium;
                    action reset-both;
                    threat-name any;
                    host any;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    url-filtering {
        strict-url-filter {
            block {
                adult;
                malware;
                phishing;
                command-and-control;
                cryptocurrency;
                hacking;
            }
            alert {
                unknown;
                streaming-media;
                peer-to-peer;
            }
            credential-enforcement {
                mode ip-user;
                block {
                    adult;
                    malware;
                    phishing;
                }
            }
            log-container-page-only yes;
            safe-search-enforcement yes;
        }
    }
    wildfire-analysis {
        strict-wildfire {
            rules {
                forward-all {
                    application any;
                    file-type any;
                    direction both;
                    analysis public-cloud;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    file-blocking {
        strict-file-block {
            rules {
                block-dangerous-files {
                    application any;
                    file-type {
                        bat;
                        dll;
                        exe;
                        hlp;
                        jar;
                        ocx;
                        pif;
                        reg;
                        scr;
                    }
                    direction both;
                    action block;
                }
                alert-office-files {
                    application any;
                    file-type {
                        doc;
                        docx;
                        xls;
                        xlsx;
                        ppt;
                        pptx;
                    }
                    direction both;
                    action alert;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
